com.baypackets.ase.sbb
Class SBBFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.baypackets.ase.sbb.SBBFactory
public abstract class SBBFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The SBBFactory class provides a factory for obtaining service building block objects.

An instance of the SBB Factory can be obtained using the instance() method defined in this class. The instance() method creates an object of the class specified using the system property "SBBFactory.class". The class specified using this property should extend the SBBFactory class and should have a public default Constructor.

Author:
BayPackets
See Also:
SBB

Method Detail

instance

getSBB

public abstract SBB getSBB(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           javax.servlet.sip.SipApplicationSession appSession,
                           javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
This method creates and returns an implementation of the SBB interface as specified by the given "type" parameter.

Parameters:
type - The fully qualified class name of the SBB interface to return (ex. com.baypackets.ase.sbb.b2b.B2bSessionController).
name - The unique name that will be assigned to the returned SBB.
appSession - App session to which the returned SBB will be associated
ctx - The ServletContext to which the returned SBB will be associated
Returns:
An implementation of the SBB interface. The caller will be required to cast the returned object to the type specified by the given "type" parameter.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given "type" parameter refers to an unknown SBB type or if an SBB with the specified name is already associated with the given app session.
